site_name: K1 Site bounded by Brompton Road, Sloane Street, Basil Street and Hoopers Court, London SW3
description: Details required by Conditions 45 (submission of details - a) sample of materials, b) sample panel, c) loading bay, g) entrances, j) external lighting), 50 (submission of details - shopfronts), 57 (submission of details (13-15 Brompton Road) - b) work or repairs to stonework, c) replacement end pilaster, d) replacement windows, e) dormer surrounds, f) parapet walls and chimneys, g) material sample of roof covering), 58 submission of details (17-27 Brompton Road) - b) brickwork, c) replacement end pilaster, d) replacement windows, e) stone bays, f) dormer surrounds, g)parapet walls and chimneys, h) material sample of roof covering) of planning permission PP/18/02459 (Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission ref. PP/16/00423 to allow two retail units within 17-27 Brompton Road to be amalgamated into one larger retail unit, with associated internal alterations and alterations to facade of 13-27 Brompton Road including partial demolition and rebuild (MAJOR DEVELOPMENT))
